properties.entry: SELECT REG_NO , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT || '명' "REG_COUNT" , REG_CAL FROM REGISTER JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = 2 AND DECODE(REG_CAL, 'N', '정산 미신청', 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') LIKE ? ORDER BY REG_NO DESC
SELECT REG_PRICE FROM REGISTER WHERE REG_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CALCULATE ( CAL_NO , PRICE , BANK , CAL_ACC , CAL_NM , CAL_REG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CCNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE REGISTER SET REG_CAL = 'W' WHERE REG_NO = ?

SELECT CAL_NO , RQ_DT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "PRICE" , BANK , RPAD(SUBSTR(CAL_ACC, 1, 4), LENGTH(CAL_ACC)-4, '*') || SUBSTR(CAL_ACC, -4, 4) "CAL_ACC" , CAL_NM , DECODE(CAL_STA, 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') "CAL_STA" FROM (SELECT * FROM CALCULATE JOIN REGISTER ON(SUBSTR(CAL_REG,1,INSTR(CAL_REG, ',') - 1) = REG_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN TUTOR T ON(C.MEM_NO = T.MEM_NO) ORDER BY CAL_NO DESC) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND DECODE(CAL_STA, 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') LIKE ?

SELECT CAL_NO , RQ_DT , PRICE , BANK , RPAD(SUBSTR(CAL_ACC, 1, 4), LENGTH(CAL_ACC)-4, '*') || SUBSTR(CAL_ACC, -4, 4) "CAL_ACC" , CAL_NM , DECODE(CAL_STA, 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') "CAL_STA" FROM CALCULATE JOIN REGISTER ON(SUBSTR(CAL_REG,1,INSTR(CAL_REG, ',') - 1) = REG_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN TUTOR T ON(C.MEM_NO = T.MEM_NO) WHERE CAL_NO = ?

SELECT CAL_NO , RQ_DT , TO_CHAR(PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "PRICE" , BANK , CAL_ACC , CAL_NM , DECODE(CAL_STA, 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') "CAL_STA" , MEM_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM CALCULATE JOIN REGISTER ON(SUBSTR(CAL_REG,1,1) = REG_NO) JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY CAL_NO DESC) WHERE DECODE(CAL_STA, 'W', '정산 진행중', 'C', '정산완료') LIKE ?
UPDATE CALCULATE SET CAL_STA = ? WHERE CAL_NO = ?
SELECT CAL_REG FROM CALCULATE WHERE CAL_NO = ?
UPDATE REGISTER SET REG_CAL = ? WHERE REG_NO =?
